description:
The Akudarma trio go to Vienna in 1819 to find the famous composer, Beethoven. The hear a melody from the piano, but Beethoven has a conductor’s wand in his mouth for some reason. Apparently he was having a hard time figuring out how to finish his 9th. The trio faces off with Tokio and Calen to see who can make a meal that Beethoven would like more!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beethoven no Shouzouga ga Kowai Kao ni Natte Iru Bikkuri Dokkuri na Riyuu to wa!?
What`s the Super Surprising Reason Beethoven Looks So Scary in His Portrait?!
ベートーヴェンの肖像画が怖い顔になっているビックリドッキリな理由とは!?
